data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Sanaag, Somalia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sanaag, Somalia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, 40,800 people live in the state of Sanaag. Please, give them 8 new simple churches this year.

data.section_summary: On average, 18 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Sanaag, Somalia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the 6 believers find a person of peace today among the 40,795 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Sanaag, Somalia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Arab people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 40,800 souls in Sanaag and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Sanaag who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the state of Sanaag, Somalia has a population of 40,800.

We estimate Sanaag has 6 people who might know Jesus, 117 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 40,678 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,800 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 40,678 lost people in  Sanaag, Somalia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

location.name: Sanaag
